texts.explanation: The possibility of buying tickets to certain events depends on the country of the origin of your card. Please choose one of the options below.

emailLeelaCertificate.help: If you have received a Leela Guide Certificate with an e-mail address that is different from the e-mail used on Leela.Game, you can provide that e-email address in the field above. After that, you will receive a confirmation link to the provided e-mail. When you click that link, the information about your certificate will be loaded into your profile.
emailLeelaCertificate.label: E-mail for loading Leela Guide Certificate

firstName.help: Not required. Fill only if you want other people to see your real name.
firstName.label: Name

location.help: To help people find a nearest Event Organizer by address
location.label: You current location

share_email.label: Show email to my events members

share_phone.label: Show phone number to my events members

share_telegram.label: Show Telegram contact to my events members

timezone.help: For correct time displaying on the platform
timezone.label: Your timezone

texts.shareContacts: Your email, phone, telegram - can be shown to the people who have booked your events. Your contacts will remain invisible for other users.

buyingInCountries.label: Please choose what payment methods are available to you

options.worldExceptRussia: ‚òπÔ∏è I don't have a card issued by Russian bank. Don't show me events from Russian organizers.

texts.explanation: The event organizer is located in Russia. Tickets to this event can be purchased only using a card issued by a Russian bank.
texts.explanation2: Some of the event organizers are located in Russia. Tickets to their events can be purchased only using a card, issued by a Russian bank.

timezone.help: For correct time displaying on the platform
timezone.label: Your timezone

agreeAgreement.label: I've read and accept the <2>User agreement</2>

agreeDogovor.label: I've read and accept the <2>Merchant agreement</2>

isGuide.label: I want to register as an Event Organizer

texts.aboutGuides: Organizer's account has all the features of the User's account, plus the possibility of selling tickets to Organizer's events.

buyingInCountries.label: Please choose what payment methods are available to you

options.russia: ‚òπÔ∏è I don't have a card issued outside of Russia. Don't show me events from non-Russian organizers.
options.world: üôÇ I have a card issued outside of Russia

texts.explanation: The event organizer is located outside of Russia. Tickets to this event can be purchased only using a card issued outside of Russia.
texts.explanation2: Some of the event organizers are located outside of Russia. Tickets to their events can be purchased only using a card, issued by a non-Russian bank.
